General.Name: Bundamedik Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Bundamedik Tbk provides health care services in Indonesia. The company also engages in the wholesale and distribution of drugs, pharmaceuticals, and medical equipment; private hospital and healthcare support service activities; provision of ambulance services; private health education; consultant for reproductive technology services management; management consultant of physiotherapy service; and hotel, medical tourism, and management consulting businesses. It operates maternal and child hospitals, general hospitals, clinics, IVF clinics, and diagnostic laboratories. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Bunda Medik is a subsidiary of PT Bunda Investama Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Teuku Cik Ditiro No.28, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10350
